ValidationRule.description: The associated app cannot be edited after the opp is created
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = false,
left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment , 15),
ischanged(Associated_Application__c),
not(isnew()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Associated Application can't be changed.
